articles.author: Eric Tucker
articles.title: Taliban frees an American man who was abducted while traveling in Afghanistan more than 2 years ago - The Associated Press
articles.description: Secretary of State Marco Rubio is praising Qatar for helping the U.S. secure the release of an American held by the Taliban for more than two years. Rubio said Thursday George Glezmann will be reunited with his wife. The airline mechanic from Atlanta is the t…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) An American man who was abducted more than two years ago while traveling through Afghanistan as a tourist has been released by the Taliban in a deal with the Trump administration that… [+3944 chars]

articles.title: Celtics sold to William Chisholm, California private-equity director, for $6.1 billion - The Boston Globe
articles.description: William Chisholm grew up on the North Shore and is a Celtics fan. The sale is the highest sum ever paid for a sports team in North America.
articles.content: The new ownership group also includes Boston business executives such as current Celtics co-owner Robert Hale; Bruce Beal Jr., president of Related Companies; and the global investment firm Sixth Str… [+4514 chars]
